segments.text: I think that the company retreat should be in the mountains this year .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: January would be a good month for a mountain retreat .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I like the mountain idea , but I am not so sure about the month of January .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You know , now that I think about it , you might be right .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: April might be nice . It is far enough away to make the necessary arrangements .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We could ask everyone what would be the best time for them .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , that would let us know what would work best .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll put the survey online this afternoon .
segments.speaker: S2
